events.name: Making in Art: Workshop for families
events.description:
Lets roll our sleeves and get ready for Maker Faire 2016. Our first workshop this year, Making in Art, explores crafting with everyday materials in novel ways, and tinkering with STEAM. Make:
Thurmatropes, plastic bottle flowers, paper crafts, music systems, paper circuits and much much more!!!

events.name: Demo Of Mobile App To Personalize Eyewear
events.description: ***This event is postponed. New date TBA.***APOLOGIES FOR ANY INCONVENIENCE CAUSED. Hi there, We have a venue for our upcoming 3D eyewear meetup-it's at the Tech Circle The Tech Circle space is in the Raffles City Tower. That’s right above the City Hall MRT, an ideal location if you’re having meetings in the city. In order to get in from the MRT, you’re going to have to go around to the office tower. The visitor entrance is down the street from the taxi stand facing Chijmes on North Bridge Road. Head straight to the lobby reception and tell them you are a guest of Vertex and attending an event. They will get your ID and issue you a temporary card. Take the card and scan it into the visitor gate and proceed to the 5th floor. Head to unit 05-03. There you’ll find the Tech Circle space. The space When you reach the space, normally you will need some fancy software to open the door. This time, simply walk right in as we're waiting to let you in. Hope to see you there :)
events.location: Technopreneur Circle, SINGAPORE  250 North Bridge Road, #05-01  Raffles City Tower,  Singapore 179101

events.name: Introduction to HTML / CSS - Hackerschool
events.description:
Want to make a website, but found w3c's tutorials too boring? 

We'll teach you HTML and CSS from scratch. Come down to get hands-on experience in designing beautiful webpages, and walk away with a basic, personalized website. Remember to bring your own laptop!

This workshop is absolutely FREE! Sign up now at school.nushackers.org
events.location: Seminar Room 3 (COM1-02-12), School of Computing, National University of Singapore
